about_the_game:
Forcibly enlighten the opposition with the Technological Superiority pack, featuring a selection of the Vanu Sovereignty’s unique plasma-powered arsenal. This pack contains weapons and camouflage for vehicles, infantry and MAXes, as well as a 7-day 50% squad XP boost.

This bundle includes:

  • Implant: Squad XP Boost - 7 Day
  • Purple Giraffe Camo VS: Combined Camo Tint Purple Giraffe
  • Lasher X2 VS: Chain Gun 01:
  • Abstract Camo VS: Combined Camo Tint Abstract
  • Light PPA Vehicle - Scythe - Weapon - Light PPA - Nose Cannon
  • Proton II PPA-H Vehicle - Harasser - Weapon - PPA-H - VS
  • Vortex VM21 VS: MAX: AV 02: Right
  • Vortex VM21 VS: MAX: AV 02: Left
  • Saron HRB Vehicle - Magrider - Weapon - Saron HRB
  • Spiker VS: Pistol 04:
  • Lancer VS22 VS: Rocket Launcher 04: ES
  • Supernova FPC Vehicle - Magrider - Weapon - Plasma AP - FPC

Note: The boost contained in this bundle will only be granted to the in-game character that redeems the bundle. Any other items will be granted to all characters of the appropriate faction.

Forcibly enlighten the opposition with the Technological Superiority pack, featuring a selection of the Vanu Sovereignty’s unique plasma-powered arsenal. This pack contains weapons and camouflage for vehicles, infantry and MAXes, as well as a 7-day 50% squad XP boost.

This bundle includes:

  • Spiker VS: Pistol 04:

Note: The boost contained in this bundle will only be granted to the in-game character that redeems the bundle. Any other items will be granted to all characters of the appropriate faction.

name: PlanetSide 2 : Technological Superiority Pack - Vanu Sovereignty

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *:Windows XP
  • Processor:Intel Core 2 Duo E6850 or higher / AMD Phenom II X2 or higher
  • Memory:4 GB RAM
  • Graphics:nVidia GeForce 8600 series or higher / AMD or ATI 4850 series or higher
  • DirectX®:9.0
  • Hard Drive:15 GB HD space
  • Sound:DirectX compatible Sound Card
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *:Windows 7
  • Processor:Intel i5 processor or higher / AMD Phenom II X6 or higher
  • Memory:6 GB RAM
  • Graphics:nVidia GeForce 540 or higher / AMD HD 6870 or higher
  • DirectX®:9.0
  • Hard Drive:15 GB HD space
  • Sound:DirectX compatible Sound Card
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection

short_description: Forcibly enlighten the opposition with the Technological Superiority pack, featuring a selection of the Vanu Sovereignty’s unique plasma-powered arsenal. This pack contains weapons and camouflage for vehicles, infantry and MAXes, as well as a 7-day 50% squad XP boost.
supported_languages: English, German, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Turkish
